name: Cleaning House
writer: Carter Bays (created by), Carter Bays (creator), Craig Thomas (created by), Craig Thomas (creator), Stephen Lloyd, Matt Kuhn (executive story editor)
actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders, Neil Patrick Harris
plot: The gang accompanies Barney and his brother James after they find the man who may be Barney's father, but it turns out to be James' father instead.
